name: Vaultomb
description:
A downloadable game for iOS and Android devices

Vaultomb is a free post apocalyptic RPG game where current world doesn't exist anymore. The world we knew doesn't exist anymore. It has been completely destroyed in the global conflict called Nuclear War. It brought radioactive fallout, hunger and mutation. Most of the people died in the first days of the war, but some of them survived by moving to the underground Vaults. Are you one of them? Are you a real survivor? Join the caravan to the new world, build safe Shelter on the Wastelands and survive as long as you can.

No one ever said it would be easy to survive in the world after the apocaylpse. You are going to face a lot of problems. How to get the equipment? Is the wastelands safe to explore? How to get a friends? All of these are only your problems now.

FEATURES:
* Free to Play
* Explore the wastelands & fight encountered enemies
* Guild system with fights & upgradable Vault
* Unique post apocaylptic world
* PvP against other real players
* Thousands of weapons and armors
* Unlock achievements to improve your chance of survive
* Real-time online gameplay
* Fight through Vault guards to get unique items

War never changes, but take your chance to rule the existing world with the help of your friends. Explore the abandoned Vaults and locations to get more powerful equipment and beat other survivors in their way to the fame. There are not much resources left in this radioactive world, you better hurry up - collect your stocks and build most impressing Shelter.
